title: Afamia Eck
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, International, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out, European, German, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Typical German doner restaurant with vegetarian and vegan choices. First vegan doner in the city with made-in-house vegan sauces, vegan burgers and soups. Every Monday you can try a new vegan dessert.
